Sentencas: Molybdenum-based double perovskites have been extensively studied as electrode materials in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) due to their mixed ionic/electronic conductivity (MIEC) characteristics.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: Since the ionic conductivity in perovskite crystals arises primarily from oxygen ion diffusion via a vacancy-hopping mechanism, both the formation energy of the oxygen vacancy and the migration energy barrier play an essential role in the MIEC performance.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: In this work, we present a detailed first-principles investigation on the stoichiometric and oxygen-deficient structures of double perovskites, Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co and Ni), using the density functional theory (DFT) method plus Hubbard U for Co and Ni.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: The electronic ground states of the oxygen-stoichiometric cells exhibited apparent eigenvalue gaps which are consistent with the measured insulating features.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: The oxygen-deficient structures were studied by removing a neutral oxygen atom according to SOFC working conditions, and the minimum energy path (MEP) of oxygen ion migration was optimized using the nudged elastic band (NEB) method which produced the theoretical migration energy barriers at the DFT+U level.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: The vacant oxygen sites released electrons to the adjacent cation d states, coupled with the delocalization characteristics of the Mo 4d state, which led eventually to the transition from an insulator to the electronic conductivity of the oxygen-deficient crystals.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: The electronic structure analysis suggested that the outer shell electrons of Mg, Co and Ni significantly affected the energies of oxygen vacancy formation and migration.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)

Sentencas: Our results elucidate the effect of B-site substitution elements on the electronic properties and MIEC characteristics which provides theoretical support for the enhancement of the MIEC properties for these Mo-based double perovskites.
Titulo: First principles analysis of oxygen vacancy formation and migration in Sr2BMoO6 (B = Mg, Co, Ni)
